code: import mapboxgl from'mapbox-gl';import{accessToken}from'./const';mapboxgl.accessToken=accessToken;export function findState(allState,stateName){var result=allState.find(function(state){return state.properties.SIGLA_UF===stateName;});return result;}export function fitCenter(map){map.flyTo({center:[-58,-15],zoom:3.4});}
